entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 29 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 29 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
